name: NGS SP3 File
summary: Learn about .SP3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The original SP3 format, called SP3-a, was extended to include additional information in the SP3-b and SP3-c formats.

description: File created in the National Geodetic Survey (NGS) Standard Product #3 (SP3) format; saved in a plain text ASCII format and contains satellite orbit information; used for tracking GPS satellite orbits, but also supports non-GPS orbits as well.
